app.title: WorldAround

trip.consumesIntro: We care deeply about the health of our planet, so we do our best to avoid excessive pollution when organizing our trips.
trip.tagsText: Our costumers say this is one of the best for:

score.title: WorldAround quality index
score.description: To ensure we always meet your expectations, every trip is assigned a quality index based on the following criteria:
score.rating: Review score - your opinion matters the most!
score.reviews: Number of reviews - the more reviews, the more accurate the final score.
score.co2: Emissions - less is better for a cleaner world!

app.tripOfDay: Discover the trip of the day
